author: DonaldScranton

thread.title: What's the difference between "Review my..." and "... Workshop"?
thread.title_full: What's the difference between "Review my..." and "... Workshop"?

text:
Here's the answer for anyone who stumbles across this
Prose workshop:
Unlike the normal Review My Work board, discussions will break out on threads related to the original post. Critiques will be well thought out and in some cases harsh, but always polite. The poster might also hear things about their writing that will hurt, but we are adults after all and we know how to behave.
